tasks.all-tests: deno install --allow-scripts=npm:playwright-chromium && deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check src/index.ts && deno doc --lint src/index.ts && deno publish --allow-dirty --dry-run && TZ=America/Toronto deno test -A --fail-fast && deno task llm
tasks.llm: deno doc --json src/index.ts > docs.json && deno run -A src/generateLlmMd.ts && deno fmt llm.md
tasks.patch: deno task all-tests && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts patch
tasks.minor: deno task all-tests && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts minor
tasks.major: deno task all-tests && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts major
